name: QuickCook
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: quick cook
des: This skill teaches how to make some really simple snacks.It contains a total of fifteen recipes.All the recipes are fairly simple to make and can be considered a good starting point for learning cooking.After the skill is launched, the user will be given five recipes to choose. The user can select one of the recipes by saying 'the first one' or 'the second one' or 'the third one' or 'the fourth one' or 'the fifth one' depending on their choice.If they want to see another list of recipes then they must say 'more recipes' to get another list. Once the user chooses a recipe, the list of ingredients to make the recipe will be given. Next, when the user says 'proceed ' or 'continue' the procedure to make the snack is given. If the user wants to continue learning more recipes they can say 'more recipes' then they can choose another recipe to learn. The user can ask alexa to repeat an instruction if they want to listen again. If a user wants to choose another recipe from the same list given then they can say 'another recipes' to choose another recipe from the same list given.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
